member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Reports.Web.ReportsAspNetModule.DefaultPreviewFormat

summary.para: Specifies in which format reports are previewed when they are pressed in a List View.

member.value: The ReportOutputType enumeration value that specifies the display format of reports from the Report List View.
